# NSOpenGLGlobalOption.useBuildCache

**Case**

Whether to enable the function compilation block cache. This is off by default. It must be enabled at startup.

## Declaration

```swift
case useBuildCache
```

## Constants

- **NSOpenGLGlobalOption.formatCacheSize**: Sets the size of the pixel format cache.
- **NSOpenGLGlobalOption.clearFormatCache**: Resets the pixel format cache if true.
- **NSOpenGLGlobalOption.retainRenderers**: Whether to retain loaded renderers in memory.
